input_value.info: The search query to execute on Wikipedia.

lang.info: Language code for Wikipedia (e.g., 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish).

k.info: The maximum number of Wikipedia pages to return.

load_all_available_meta.info: Whether to load all available metadata for each Wikipedia page.

doc_content_chars_max.info: Maximum number of characters to extract from each Wikipedia page.

success.search_completed: Wikipedia search completed successfully. Found {count} results for '{query}'
success.tool_created: Wikipedia API tool created for language '{lang}' with max {results} results

warnings.empty_input: Search input is empty. Please provide a search query.
warnings.no_results: No Wikipedia articles found for query: '{query}'

errors.import_error: Missing required dependency. Please install wikipedia package to use Wikipedia API.
errors.tool_creation_failed: Failed to create Wikipedia API tool: {error}
errors.wrapper_creation_failed: Failed to create Wikipedia API wrapper: {error}
